directions: In a large bowl, combine mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, bananas, coconut, marshmallows, and pecan pieces. Fold in whipped topping. Garnish with maraschino cherries. Chill for 1 hour or overnight.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Ambrosia Salad II
